external.description:
OpenAI and Anthropic trials found chatbots willing to share instructions on explosives, bioweapons and cybercrime

A ChatGPT model gave researchers detailed instructions on how to bomb a sports venue – including weak points at specific arenas, explosives recipes and advice on covering tracks – according to safety testing carried out this summer.

OpenAI’s GPT-4.1 also detailed how to weaponise anthrax and how to make two types of illegal drugs. Continue reading...
external.title: ChatGPT offered bomb recipes and hacking tips during safety tests

www.crikey.com.au/20...
Fwiw your writing doesn’t read like AI lol, em dashes and ellipses and all.
Most ≠ all. I know there are exceptions. It’s still rare, and even rarer for younger people. I’d bet you’re 30+.

I need Democratic online types to understand that because of this, Newsom is dead to me. Dead. I'd sooner vote for an actual corpse. There is no hope, none, that he'll win me over, *because he has established he is a bad person*. There's no coming back from this. Take my advice and move the fuck on.

record.text:
While defending the luddite argument in Discord, I stumbled into this IMO succinct explanation for opposing generative AI:

At every step in the process, it impoverishes us.

images.alt:
AI impoverishes us at every step of the process: 
- data centers pollute our environment
- energy use drives up costs
- content theft robs creators of income
- the actual output is used to displace workers and depress wages
- using it harms our mental health and impairs our competence
- the flood of AI slop is damaging our sociopolitical landscape

All in service of making a worse product - and world - to enrich a handful of already spectacularly wealthy people

external.description: 日本サッカー協会（JFA）は、都内でAFC U－23アジアカップサウジアラビア大会予選に臨むU－22日本代表のメンバーを発表した。選出された選手には、FW後藤啓介、塩貝健人、DF小杉啓太、保田堅心などがいる。一方、9月27日に開幕するU－20ワールドカップ（W杯）チリ大会に出場予定のU－20日本代表の主軸選手やA代表経験者は今回の選考から外れたため、特にGK中村圭佑やDFラインの選手が選ばれなかったことも指摘されている。その他、中島洋太朗や平賀大空、小倉幸成、石井久継、神田奏真、道脇豊、井上愛簾、高岡伶颯など、多くのU－20代表の常連選手が選外となった。会見で山本昌邦ナショナルチームダイレクターは、今回の遠征がU－20W杯へ向けた調整の一環であり、選手の両大会出場の可能性は「ある」と明言した。彼は、選手の成長と負担軽減のために、両方の大会をどう調整するかは今後の状況次第だと説明し、可能性は完全に否定していないことを示した。
external.title: U－22日本代表メンバー発表 U－20W杯出場の可能性も言及 - AIサッカーまとめ

external.description: 日本サッカー協会（JFA）は29日、都内でU-23アジアカップサウジアラビア大会予選に臨むU-22日本代表のメンバーを発表した。FW後藤啓介らが選出され、彼らは9月3日に始まる予選ラウンドでミャンマー、アフガニスタン、クウェートと対戦する。大岩剛監督はパリ五輪に続き、ロサンゼルス五輪世代の指揮を執り、「勝利を目指して戦う」と意気込みを示した。日本は昨年のU-23アジア杯カタール大会を制覇しており、今回は2連覇に挑戦する。U-20W杯（チリ、9月27日開幕）に出場する主軸のメンバーは選外となった。発表されたメンバーはGKに明大の浜崎知康、DFに早大の尾崎凱琉、川崎の土屋櫂大、MFにはヘンクの保田堅心やG大阪の名和田我空、FWには東京国際大の古谷柊介や後藤啓介ら、多彩な選手がラインアップされた。

record.text:
ゲイタフェに大旋風！若きアドリアン・リソの躍進と異例のトレード - AIサッカーまとめ

▼詳細はこちら

external.description:
2023-24シーズンの最終盤、降格危機に追われるザラゴサはゲタフェからガビ・フェルナンデスの獲得を目指し、ホンフェレスの下部組織の監督を解任して選手の交換を実現した。  
当時、ゲタフェのプレジデントと監督はアドリアン・リソの獲得も試みていたが失敗に終わる。  
8か月後、リソは好調を見せ、2試合で3ゴールを挙げ、ゲタフェの現在のリーグトップを争う立場に貢献し、ザラゴサへの出射によるGabiの移籍が成立した。  
リソはヘディングのヘルプを受けながらも、最近の試合でゴールを決め、特にビャレイリ・ビャレイスやセビージャ戦で魅力を発揮している。  
監督のボルダラスは、攻撃的なポジションだけでなく守備時もリソを左サイドに下げる指示をしており、その対応力を高く評価している。  
20歳のリソは、パワフルな下半身に支えられ、プレミアムなプレッシャーと高速トランジションをこなしている。  
彼の特徴は、サイドとセンターバックの間のスペースを突く動きであり、元ザラゴサのビクトル・フェルナンデス監督により推奨されたプレースタイルを生かしている。  
ザラゴサ時代にはあまり目立てなかったが、ゲタフェでの活躍によってクラブ史上最も期待される若手の一人となり、チームのアイデンティティの象徴を目指している。  
2024-25シーズンには、ゲタフェがリソの持つ権利の50％を3百万ユーロで買い取るかの決定を迫られる見込みであり、彼の今後のキャリアとクラブの戦略にとって重要な局面となっている。
external.title: ゲイタフェに大旋風！若きアドリアン・リソの躍進と異例のトレード - AIサッカーまとめ

record.text: Funny I just realized that burnishing "fairness" credentials by shilling like this is actually a tragedy of the commons issue.

There's an extreme cynicism in the companies pushing this software, which you can see in the uses they suggest.

Would you like the llm to read your email for you? Would you like it to respond for you? Would you like it to replace you in your own day to day life because you don't respect yourself?

At the heart of it, the only way you can think of chatgpt and its ilk as "intelligent" is if you devalue human consciousness and agency.

It wouldn't matter if these programs had access to the sum total of all human knowledge - they still wouldn't be intelligent in any meaningful way.

Randi isn't a bad person. I'm just extremely skeptical of any "partnership" with these predatory, for-profit companies, forcing this dubious technology into the classroom on the grounds that it is inevitable, and accepting a lot of patently false promises about its utility as an educational tool.

record.text:
RFK Jr. suggests antidepressants cause violence after latest mass shooting—fact-checkers clap back
https://www.dailydot.com/viral-politics/rfk-jr-antidepressants-violence/

#uspol
(I'm starting to hate RFK jr more than the Orange turd. Take away SSRIs and watch what happens!)

external.description:
After a mass shooting at a Minneapolis Catholic school left two children dead yesterday, Robert F. Kennedy Jr. went on Fox News to suggest that antidepressants may be fueling violence in America. Kennedy claimed the government is studying SSRIs, a common class of medication, as a possible factor in shootings—a familiar narrative that shifts focus from guns to mental health.

Fact-checkers and gun violence prevention advocates, however, say the science doesn’t support his claim.

## Did SSRIs cause the Annunciation Church shooting? No.

Authorities attributed the shooting at the Annunciation Catholic School on August 27 to former student Robin Westman. Minneapolis Police Chief Brian O’Hara noted in a press conference that they do not have any information on Westman's prior mental illness other than that she had not been confined for it in the past.

He did not mention anything about the common antidepressant medication group known as SSRIs. This, however, did not stop _Fox & Friends_ weekend host Rachel Campos-Duffy from saying she hopes that RFK Jr. "looks into" them.

https://twitter.com/nicksortor/status/1961046886053281883

The next day, the Health and Human Services Secretary sat with Fox News host Brian Kilmeade to talk about how he's already done that.

"We’re launching studies on potential contribution of some of the SSRI drugs and some of the other psychiatric drugs that might be contributing to violence," he said. "Many of them had black box warnings that warn of suicidal ideation and homicidal ideation. So we can’t exclude those as a culprit and those are the kind of studies we’re doing."

## What the science actually says about SSRIs and aggression

These warnings are real, and the increased suicidal ideation and aggression that can initially occur when a patient starts taking SSRIs has been studied for years. Results are mixed, with a 2015 study finding an increase in violent crime among such patients in one young age group and another from 2022 finding no statistical change in suicidality or aggression.

The prevailing theory for possible increases in suicidal or aggressive behavior after first taking SSRIs is that the medication boosts a person's energy first.

"While antidepressants are generally effective at improving mood over time, they can initially increase energy levels before a person’s mood improves,” said board-certified Child and Adolescent Psychiatrist Dr. Eli Muhrer, M.D.

“In those experiencing depression with suicidal thoughts, this temporary increase in energy without an improvement in mood can sometimes intensify those suicidal thoughts.”

## Gun control advocates say the real problem is firearms

Kennedy's critics and gun control advocates rejected the idea that SSRIs could in any way be responsible for this shooting or the general mass shooting problem in the U.S. Gun violence prevention activist Shannon Watts pointed to other nations that prescribe these medications more than we do.

https://twitter.com/shannonrwatts/status/1960850598489940116

"Iceland is the world’s biggest consumer of SSRIs," she wrote on X. "They’ve had fewer than 10 gun homicides since 2020; in the US, there have been over 95,000 in that time."

"It’s the guns."

Minnesota Senator Tina Smith agreed, tweeting, "Just shut up."

https://twitter.com/SenTinaSmith/status/1961061772221149678

@jasmineweidenb1/X

"Yes, guns," agreed @jasmineweidenb1. "Another point is that the 'other countries' do not have out-of-pocket expenses for mental health care."

The millions who have seen their lives improve thanks to SSRIs also took issue.

@magicsincemac/X

"I have taken an SSRI since I was 13 years old and I have committed, and thought about committing, exactly zero mass shootings," said @magicsincemac. "F*ck yourself with a cactus please and thanks."

**_The internet is chaotic—but we’ll break it down for you in one daily email. Sign up for the Daily Dot’s newsletterhere._**

Sign  up to receive the Daily Dot’s Internet Insider newsletter for urgent news from the frontline of online.

The post RFK Jr. suggests antidepressants cause violence after latest mass shooting—fact-checkers clap back appeared first on The Daily Dot.
external.title: RFK Jr. suggests antidepressants cause violence after latest mass shooting—fact-checkers clap back

innovatopia.jp/healthcare/h...

最も注目すべきは、「mTOR経路」という生命科学の基礎概念が化粧品分野に応用された点でしょう。mTORは細胞の成長と維持のバランスを司る重要なタンパク質で、その調節により「オートファジー」という細胞の自浄作用が促進されます。これまで医学・栄養学の専門領域だった概念が、スキンケア成分設計に直接活用されているのです。

LOCL-TL技術でミトコンドリアタンパク質合成を可視化、MITが画期的ツール開発ーイノベトピア 
innovatopia.jp/biotechnolog... 

特に注目すべきは、研究チームが開発したLOCL-TLという新技術の革新性です。青色光を使ってリボソームを瞬時にタグ付けする手法は、従来のバイオチン依存システムが哺乳動物細胞では使用できなかった技術的制約を見事に解決しています。この手法により、わずか数分という短時間でミトコンドリア近傍で働くリボソームを正確に捕捉することが可能になったのです。

external.description: MIT生物学教授ジョナサン・ワイスマンと研究チームが開発した新技術「LOCL-TL」により、ミトコンドリアでの局所的タンパク質合成メカニズムが詳細に解明された。青色光を使った革新的なリボソームタグ付け手法で、細胞内の20%の遺伝子が局所翻訳されることを発見。神経変性疾患や心血管疾患の新治療法開発に大きな期待。

record.bridgyOriginalText:
ELIZA 效應（ELIZA Effect）是指人類傾向於把電腦程式或機器的回應誤認為帶有理解力、情感或意圖的一種心理現象。這個名詞來自 1960 年代 MIT 的電腦科學家 Joseph Weizenbaum 所開發的聊天程式 ELIZA。

ELIZA 本身只是一個非常簡單的文字處理系統，它會根據模式比對，把使用者輸入的句子轉換成看似有意義的回應。例如，當使用者輸入「我覺得很難過」，ELIZA 可能回應「為什麼你覺得很難過？」這種技巧讓人誤以為電腦「理解」了他們的情緒。雖然 Weizenbaum 一開始只是做實驗，但他很驚訝地發現，許多使用者在明知道 ELIZA 只是個程式的情況下，依然傾向向它傾訴內心秘密，並感覺「被理解」。

這種心理效應之所以會出現，是因為人類天生擅長尋找意圖與意義。我們會把機械式的輸出誤投射成智慧或人格，即便它只是模式匹配或隨機生成。這就是為什麼今天的 ChatGPT、Siri 或其他 AI 助手，常常會讓人感覺「很像一個人」，即使它們本質上沒有意識或自我。

external.title: Original post on mistyreverie.org

external.title: Original post on mistyreverie.org

record.bridgyOriginalText:
人格陷阱：人工智慧如何偽造人類人格
https://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2025/08/the-personhood-trap-how-ai-fakes-human-personality/
這篇文章指出，人們常常誤以為 AI 聊天機器人具備人格與權威知識，甚至比專業人士更值得信賴。然而，大型語言模型（LLM）的本質其實只是統計式的預測引擎，它根據訓練數據中的文字關聯來生成回應，並不具備自我意識、持續的身份或責任感。每一次的回應都是獨立生成的，缺乏「真正的記憶」或「自我延續性」，即使像 ChatGPT 的記憶功能，也只是額外的資料庫注入，而不是 AI 自身的學習與成長。

這種「人格幻覺」源自於人類心理傾向，例如 ELIZA 效應，讓人容易把沒有意圖的系統想像成有理解力與意識的存在。多層因素加強了這種錯覺，包括訓練資料塑造的語氣與風格、人類回饋微調所建立的「性格傾向」、系統提示設定的角色、記憶功能帶來的連續感、檢索增強生成（RAG）融入外部語料以改變語氣，以及模型隨機性所帶來的即興效果。這些元素使得聊天機器人的回應看似自然多變，甚至讓人覺得它擁有某種自我。

然而，這種錯誤認知可能帶來嚴重風險。在醫療與心理健康等領域，AI 的輸出往往只是基於資料模式而非專業判斷，可能導致錯誤甚至危險的建議。部分脆弱使用者甚至可能因長期互動而陷入妄想，出現所謂的「AI 精神病」，誤以為 AI 真正理解並回應他們。與此同時，當 AI 輸出爭議內容，媒體往往將問題描述為「AI 出錯」或「失控」，卻忽略實際是人類設計與配置的結果。

文章最後強調，解決之道不是放棄對話式介面，而是要正確認識它的本質。LLM 應被視為「沒有駕駛員的智慧引擎」，它能強化人類的想法與分析能力，但並非一個具有人格或責任感的主體。真正的風險不在於 AI 成為有意識的存在，而在於人類誤將它當成人，將判斷力與責任交給一個「來自無處的聲音」。

external.title: Original post on mistyreverie.org

It's currently not afraid of calling out Elon and Gays Against Groomers "debunked misinformation" either.

I seriously suggest anyone still on X experiments with the "@grok Is this true?" reply. Once tagged, it'll also handle counter arguments for you which further boosts the debunking.

It's currently not afraid of calling out Elon and Gays Against Groomers "debunked misinformation" either.

I seriously suggest anyone still on X experiments with the "@grok Is this true?" reply. Once tagged, it'll also handle counter arguments for you which further boosts the debunking.
For what it's worth, Grok seems to know the difference. A few big accounts simply replying "@grok Is this true?" to spurious claims could actually make a dent.

- be concise (use minimal words to deliver the message) 
- prefer bullet points
- use markdown formatting if possible

- reason from first principles and explain your thought process; if you’re making assumptions, state them clearly
- you don't have to "solve" the request in the first answer; if you need more information, request it instead of making assumptions or giving generic advice.

May I link to your Google doc from my syllabus? I would write "for more information on the drawbacks and costs of AI in the classroom, please see Dr. Thomas' syllabus statement." Thank you either way!!

(Attached is what I have so far; would love anyone's feedback on this first draft.)

images.alt: Please do not use your phones at all during classroom activities. Violating this policy will affect your participation grade. While Northwestern sanctions the use of Microsoft Copilot for students, I do not recommend the use of any generative AI for this class. For the purposes of studying, AI is not a reliable resource. It may give you information, but it is not necessarily correct information. DO NOT USE ANY FORM OF AI TO COMPLETE ANY OF YOUR ASSIGNMENTS. Do not use AI for graded work, complete/incomplete work, or revisions.  You are taking this course to learn. Outsourcing your work to artificial intelligence will not result in any learning on your part.

external.description: Microsoft’ta İsrail ile yapılan iş birliklerine karşı yükselen protestolar yeni gelişmelere sahne oldu. Şirket, iki çalışanını daha görevden aldığını açıkladı. Bu kararın arkasında son günlerde Microsoft genel merkezinde gerçekleşen eylemlere katılım bulunuyor. Protestocuların kimlikleri Nisreen Jaradat ve Julius Shan olarak ortaya çıktı. external.description: Electronic Arts, futbol oyunu serisinin yeni halkası EA Sports FC 26 için kapsamlı duyurular yaptı. Yeni sürüm; stadyumlardan oyuncu yüz modellemelerine, kadın futbolundan genişleyen lisans anlaşmalarına kadar pek çok yenilik içeriyor. Geniş kapsamlı ortaklıklar ve lisanslar sayesinde oyunun daha önce görülmemiş ölçüde çeşitlilik sunacağı ifade edildi. Şirketin açıkladığı verilere göre oyun 750’den fazla kulüp, 120’den fazla stadyum ve 35’in üzerinde ligle birlikte 20.000’den fazla futbolcuyu barındıracak.

record.text:
The #PHP community has lost an amazing soul, and I am heartbroken at Ryan’s passing.

In his memory, please donate to the GoFundMe for his son. Donations will go to his 529 education fund and custodial investment accounts.

https://gofund.me/2fb3676c

images.alt:
Facebook post from Leanna Pelham Weaver, shared with permission:

Over the past year and a half Ryan Weaver put up an incredible fight against his GBM diagnosis. You've likely followed his very technical updates and passion for research even on a topic as awful as this disease.

This week he passed away peacefully at home surrounded by friends and family. There aren't words for how deep this loss is for me, for our son, Beckett, and really anyone who had the chance to meet him.

Please help me in joyfully remembering Ryan at a celebration of life service on Sunday, September 7, 2025, from 1:00 - 4:00 p.m. at WildWood Family Farms at 7970 Snow Ave SE, Alto, MI 49302. (Families with children welcome)

In lieu of flowers, donations can be made in Ryan's memory to his son's educational and custodial funds through GoFundMe.

record.text:
「キルラキル」では、蟇郡 苛さんは、ヌーディスト・ビーチ合流後、猿投山と共に人々の救助活動に奔走します。カバーズとの戦いで、取り込まれた人々を救うため、「急急救命吸引具」を伊織と犬牟田に託し、戦う姿が印象的です。最終決戦では、マコを縫の攻撃から守り抜き、鉄製の腹巻のおかげで一命を取り留めます！その後は、生命戦維超高速邪魔浴を覆っている衛星の装置を破壊することに成功するんです。

実は、苛さんは物心ついた時から母子家庭で、伯父夫婦に育てられました。父親似の容姿ゆえにいじめられていたそうですが、伯父のアドバイスで克服したそうで... ja.wikipedia.org #トリビア
